sections.description: This is the particles chapter. Particles are the smallest building blocks. Typically they will be single HTML elements, like h1, button and so on, represented by a class to style.

sections.description: A push button. the buttons has the following modifiers:

modifiers.name: default
modifiers.markup: <button class="btn {$modifiers}">Click me baby one more time</button>
modifiers.wrappedMarkup: <button class="btn {$modifiers}">Click me baby one more time</button>

modifiers.name: .btn--alert
modifiers.description: button that calls out more attention
modifiers.markup: <button class="btn {$modifiers}">Click me baby one more time</button>
modifiers.wrappedMarkup: <button class="btn {$modifiers}">Click me baby one more time</button>

sections.markup: <button class="btn {$modifiers}">Click me baby one more time</button>
